note.p: Notes: Year of birth information taken from R C Mackenzie's article in the "Journal of Thermal Analysis" (35, 1989, 1823-1836 [Tracts X469/7]), 'George Martine (1700-1741) - An Early Thermal Analyst?'. DNB gives birth dates as 1702. There is a note in index to BR saying see information file and giving death date as 'between 20 Dec 1740 and 9 Apr 1741'.
